description.value:
When activated, half Movement and Agility Bonus, but allow for normal movement in low or zero gravity environments. Provided a suitable surface to walk on.

Requirements

Worn over normal boots or plates fitted to the bottom of armoured boots.

Effect: Rare

Notes: 65 T
